Arvada.Emmanuel Shearith Israel Chapel:
The Emmanuel Gallery is an art gallery and historic building at 1201 10th Street in Denver, Colorado, United States, on the Auraria Campus.
The gallery is housed in Denver's oldest surviving church building and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places as Emmanuel Shearith Israel Chapel. It was built in 1876 as an Episcopal church, on the site of a Sunday School building that was erected in 1859.
